attributes.action: To strengthen the validity of Basic Human Rights
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The defence of Basic Human Rights must not be compromised in any circumstances.  This belief will become universally respected and held only if the basic tenet: “Anyone wilfully violating another’s Basic Human Rights will automatically forfeit their own”, will be enshrined in law everywhere. Only then can we all be sure that such rights are truly offered for everyone.

If you believe in the just exercise of Basic Human Rights you must do everything in your position to bring the above tenet into law.

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
